page.title: 19BROWNIES IN KELVEDON
page.content: I am a {Brownie,}to become a Brownie I had to be enrolled. We jump over a hedge when we are enrolled, there are 3. Each one is made of 2 chairs with some flowers.At the end we look in the mirror on the floor and pretend it is a pond and say "twist me and turn me and show me the elf I looked in the water and there saw-{ Myself." We say this as a promise to help our leader,{Brown Owl.} At Brownies we have a sing round the toad stool then we have a pow-wow it is a talk about the events we have. Then we have a game. My favourite is "Glue Pot". Then we do Journey Work. We have lots of things to do. There are three levels, I am on "Roadway". Then we say a prayer, give out badges and end with{Brownie Bells.
